title: Detox Treatment Duo
description: Clarify and balance with the Detox Treatment Duo. Targeting blemishes and breakouts, plus excess oil, and congestion, this discovery-sized duo is powered by salicylic acid, AHAs, and charcoal for refined complexion clarity. Suitable for most skin types—especially oily and breakout-prone. Kit Includes: Beta-Clarity Pro 5 Liquid Exfoliant: Smooths, clears, and brightens skin with a powerhouse mix of five acids at a 10% concentration. Charcoal Detox Mask: Clarifies, purifies, and decongests skin with kaolin clay and charcoal. Perfect for balancing excess oil, breakouts, or a post-night-out treatment.
